item.title: Miran says half-point cut 'appropriate' for December, but Fed should at least reduce by a quarter point
item.description: Federal Reserve Governor Stephan Miran spoke Monday to CNBC.

item.title: Warren Buffett to step up giving away fortune to his children’s foundations, while supporting successor Abel
item.description: Buffett, in a Thanksgiving letter, said he needs to accelerate the disbursement of his Berkshire stock to his three children's foundations.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves midday: Penn Entertainment, Metsera, Six Flags & more
item.description: These are the stocks posting the largest moves midday.

item.title: Trump proposes 50-year mortgage, but some say homeowner savings would be minimal
item.description: The intended purpose of a longer-term mortgage would be to lower the monthly payment for homeowners. But a lower monthly payment, has other trade-offs...

item.title: Jim Chanos unwinds Strategy short as stock’s bitcoin premium collapses after 50% sell-off
item.description: Chanos said he unwound his short Strategy/long bitcoin pair trade as of Friday's open, after Strategy shares plunged about 50% from their 2025 peak.
